mapper.insert: insert into xiaoyaoji..module (id, name, host, lastUpdateTime, projectId, createTime, sort, description, requestHeaders, requestArgs) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{host,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{projectid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{requestheaders,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{requestargs,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update xiaoyaoji..module set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, host = #{host,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lastUpdateTime = #{lastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, projectId = #{projectid,jdbcType=CHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, requestHeaders = #{requestheaders,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, requestArgs = #{requestargs,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select id, name, host, lastUpdateTime, projectId, createTime, sort, description, requestHeaders, requestArgs from xiaoyaoji..module where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
